hundred thousand dollars for a joint celebration in the TV messages for a traveling show and for a display that will be housed in the archives Gallery this is raised the question are these simply patriotic messages or are they a subtle way for Philip Morris which leads the market in cigarettes with its Marlboro and Virginia Slims Brands to get around the law that bans cigarette advertising on TV representative Thomas Lucan
thanks that's just what they're doing and he held committee hearings in Washington last week to investigate further the logo
